name: VegeTevilS: Evil vegetables rising
description:
The genetically modified burger picks up the fight against evil vegetables.  Avoid the falling evil vegetables by moving left or right. Use and upgrade your skills, pick up mushrooms and beware the falling 'Evil-T'.

The First VegeTevilS War Begins.

Controls: 

• Movement: Left/Right Arrow or A/D

• Skills:

Dash: Space

Speed : E

Umbrella: F
